title: Tassel, 18th century
description: Skirt of twisted green silk threads in two lengths, each supporting a small tassel. Head, cylindrical and broadening toward the base, is wrapped in green silk thread in chevron pattern. Collars of looped silk thread at top and bottom. Cord of braided green silk threads.

tombstone.epitaph: Tassel, 18th century. Medium: silk, wooden core, linen. 1908-2-17.
